bike.description: Double-butted chromoly main tubes, extended head tube with reinforced collars, double tapered cromo stays, forged dropouts with eyelets

components.description: Chromoly unicrown, bulge butted steerer, low-rider carrier mounts and forged dropouts with double eyelets
Alex ID-19 double wall alloy rims with GSW sidewall, 32H, Formula alloy hubs with QR and 14g stainless steel spokes
Vittoria Randonneur with Double Shielding puncture protection and reflective sidewalls, 700 x 32c
Shimano Acera M360 SGS rear and M191 bottom pull front
Platform style, steel cage/resin body, toe clip attachable
Tektro alloy linear-pull brakes with front power modulator and Tektro brake levers
Jamis Urban bar, 6061 T-6 aluminum, 25.4 x 10JAMIS_DEGREE sweep x 580mm
Jamis Road, 3D forged 6061 alloy, 25.4 x 17JAMIS_DEGREE x 90mm (15/17"), 110mm (19/21/23")
Anatomic double density kraton grip with end plug
Jamis alloy micro-adjust, 27.2 x 350mm alloy clamp with QR seatpin
Jamis Touring with SL cover and satin steel rails
